mapper.update: update timage set sTransactionNum = #{stransactionnum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sImageType = #{simagetype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sProofName = #{sproofname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sOriginalName = #{soriginalname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sImageName = #{simagename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sImageSN = #{simagesn,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, sStorePath = #{sstorepath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sUploadTime = #{suploadtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where sID = #{sid,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select sID, sTransactionNum, sImageType, sProofName, sOriginalName, sImageName, sImageSN, sStorePath, sUploadTime from timage where sID = #{sid,jdbcType=BIGINT}
select sID, sTransactionNum, sImageType, sProofName, sOriginalName, sImageName, sImageSN, sStorePath, sUploadTime from timage
select * from timage where sTransactionNum = #{sTransactionNum} order by sUploadTime
